About Me

BIO

Intelligent Automation Consultant with 4 years of extensive work experience in Research & Development of Intelligent Process Automation Projects. Having hands-on experience on Python, Machine Learning, Chatbot and various market leading RPA tools such as Blueprism, Automation Anywhere, UiPath and trained on Workfusion & Nice. Helping clients in getting maximum return on investment, improving customer satisfaction, automating repetitive tasks, reducing manual efforts, improving efficiency & speed.
